title: tIrum tirccendUr
sahitya:
tIrum tiruccendUr sEruvOr tIvinai vArum ellOrum kOrum varam peravE


anupallavi

  sOrum idayattODu pAril avadiyuruvOr vIra vaDivElan sIraDi sEvittAl


caraNam    sIrittAvi karai sEra vAri mOdum tirai kaDal Oram mEvi uraiyum Arumukhan pEraruLAl
pAril eDutta piravi sIrum sirappum uravE kOruvOrin uLLam pUrikka sOrvellAm
